title: THE HOLLYWOOD PALACE -- Groucho Marx. Margaret Dumont
description:
This was Groucho's second time hosting this show. 
Also appearing are his 18 year-old daughter singer Melinda Marx 
entertainers Gordon & Sheila MacRae, and comedian Shecky Greene.

This was the last appearance anywhere of Margaret Dumont, 
the popular straight-woman in several Marx Brothers movies.
She came on Hollywood Palace at Groucho's request to again play her 
most famous role of Mrs. Rittenhouse. It was just 8 days before her death
in February 1965.  The show aired a month later.
